description: A family-run “gastrosteria” hidden in a small Venetian courtyard, with a modern and elegant decor dominated by beige and black tones. Full of exciting and imaginative flavours, the modern meat and fish dishes prepared by promising young chef Nadia Locatello make a change from the typical specialities of the region.
